Container.Name: jotty

Branch.TagDescription: Latest development branch commits. Used for development and testing of the latest features

Container.Overview: jotty·page is a lightweight alternative for managing your personal checklists and notes. It's extremely easy to deploy, keeps all your data on your own server and allows you to encrypt/decrypt your notes for your personal peace of mind.

Config.Name: PORT
Config.Description: You can change 1122 to any available port on your host system.

Config.Name: NODE_ENV
Config.Description: Sets the Node.js environment to production mode for optimal performance and security.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Process User ID that the container will run as. Remove the --user 99:100 from Extra Params in Advanced settings to change this setting.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Process Group ID that the container will run as. Remove the --user 99:100 from Extra Params in Advanced settings to change this setting.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: Sets the default file creation mask.

Config.Name: HTTPS
Config.Description: Enables HTTPS mode for secure connections.

Config.Name: SERVE_PUBLIC_IMAGES
Config.Description: Allows public access to uploaded images via direct URLs.

Config.Name: SERVE_PUBLIC_FILES
Config.Description: Allows public access to uploaded files via direct URLs.

Config.Name: SERVE_PUBLIC_VIDEOS
Config.Description: Allows public access to uploaded videos via direct URLs.

Config.Name: STOP_CHECK_UPDATES
Config.Description: If set to yes stops the github api call and won't give you a toast when a new update is available.

Config.Name: SSO_MODE
Config.Description: Enables OIDC (OpenID Connect) single sign-on authentication.

Config.Name: OIDC Issuer
Config.Description: URL of your OIDC provider (e.g., Authentik, Auth0, Keycloak).

Config.Name: OIDC Client ID
Config.Description: Client ID from your OIDC provider configuration.

Config.Name: APP_URL
Config.Description: Base URL of your jotty·page instance. Required for secure session (https) and SSO. Include the https://

Config.Name: OIDC Client Secret
Config.Description: Client secret for confidential OIDC client authentication.

Config.Name: SSO_FALLBACK_LOCAL
Config.Description: Allows both SSO and local authentication methods.

Config.Name: OIDC Admin Groups
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of OIDC groups that should have admin privileges.

Config.Name: OIDC Groups Scope
Config.Description: Scope to request for groups. Defaults to 'groups'. Set to empty string or 'no' to disable for providers like Entra ID that don't support the groups scope.

Config.Name: OIDC Logout URL
Config.Description: Custom logout URL for global logout. Full URL to redirect to when logging out.

Config.Name: INTERNAL_API_URL
Config.Description: Use if getting 403 errors after SSO login: Set to http://localhost:3000
